item.title: Seeding in-memory Entity Framework with realistic data with Bogus
item.description: You donâ€™t need a physical database to experiment with ORMs. You can use an in-memory DB and seed the database with realistic data generated with Bogus. Link to article: https://www.code4it.dev/blog/seed-inmemory-entityframework-bogus/
